# Prerequisites {-}

* *Create and [onshape account](https://cad.onshape.com)*. Onshape is a free online software for Computer-Aided Design
* *Install [Cura](https://ultimaker.com/en/products/ultimaker-cura-software) on your computer*. Cura "prepares" your 3D file for our specific model of printer (Ultimaker 3).
